ps2.6:73.1: “‘Yavata atthapatisambhidaya atthapatisambhidattho, nato dittho vidito sacchikato phassito pannaya.
ps2.6:73.5: Atthapatisambhidaya atthapatisambhidatthe pancavisati dhamma, pancavisati attha, pannasam niruttiyo, satam nanani.
ps2.6:74.3: yavata patibhanapatisambhidaya patibhanapatisambhidattho, nato dittho vidito sacchikato phassito pannaya.
ps2.6:74.7: Patibhanapatisambhidatthe pancavisati dhamma, pancavisati attha, pannasam niruttiyo, satam nanani.
ps2.6:75.1: Catusu patisambhidasu satam dhamma, satam attha, dve niruttisatani, cattari nanasatani.
ps2.6:76.1: “‘Yavata indriyaparopariyattananam, natam dittham viditam sacchikatam phassitam pannaya.
ps2.6:76.5: Indriyaparopariyattanane pancavisati dhamma, pancavisati attha, pannasam niruttiyo, satam nanani.
ps2.6:77.5: yavata anavaranam nanam, natam dittham viditam sacchikatam phassitam pannaya.
ps2.6:77.7: cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi”.
ps2.6:77.8: Anavarane nane pancavisati dhamma, pancavisati attha, pannasam niruttiyo, satam nanani.
ps2.6:78.1: Chasu buddhadhammesu diyaddhasatam dhamma, diyaddhasatam attha, tini niruttisatani, cha nanasatani.
ps2.6:79.1: Patisambhidadhikarane addhanavadhammasatani, addhanavaatthasatani, niruttisahassanca satta ca niruttisatani, tini ca nanasahassani, cattari ca nanasataniti.
